title: Add new Admin Meet photos to GallerySection (September 21, 2025)

requirements.summary: Replace existing GallerySection placeholder content with four new Admin Meet photos from September 21, 2025 event, displaying them in a responsive grid within an event card with Hindi title and location subtitle
acceptanceCriteria: All four new uploaded photos (IMG_20250921_150644.jpg, IMG_20250921_150657.jpg, IMG_20250921_150653.jpg, IMG_20250921_133711.jpg) are saved as static assets and rendered in the GallerySection.
The event card displays the title 'एडमिन पैनल मीटिंग – 21 सितंबर 2025' and subtitle 'मुंबरा (ठाणे), महाराष्ट्र, भारत'.
The section heading 'गैलेरी' and decorative gold divider are retained.
The image grid is responsive and styled consistently with the maroon/gold palette.
No placeholder or old gallery images remain visible.

file_operations.description: Save the processed photo of attendees seated indoors at Admin Meet event (from IMG_20250921_150644.jpg) as a static asset at this exact workspace path. This image will be referenced in the GallerySection component to display the first gallery photo.

Save the processed wide-angle photo of attendees seated indoors at Admin Meet event (from IMG_20250921_150657.jpg) as a static asset at this exact workspace path. This image will be referenced in the GallerySection component to display the second gallery photo.

Save the processed photo showing large group of attendees in two rooms at Admin Meet event (from IMG_20250921_150653.jpg) as a static asset at this exact workspace path. This image will be referenced in the GallerySection component to display the third gallery photo.

Save the processed photo of projector slide showing 'एडमिन पैनल मीटिंग गौसिया अशरफिया फाउंडेशन' with foundation logo (from IMG_20250921_133711.jpg) as a static asset at this exact workspace path. This image will be referenced in the GallerySection component to display the fourth gallery photo.

Replace the placeholder content with a functional gallery implementation. Add an event card structure containing the Hindi title 'एडमिन पैनल मीटिंग – 21 सितंबर 2025' and subtitle 'मुंबरा (ठाणे), महाराष्ट्र, भारत'. Implement a responsive 2-column mobile / 4-column desktop image grid displaying the four photos from frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-admin-meet-1.dim_1200x800.png through gallery-admin-meet-4.dim_1200x800.png. Retain the existing section heading 'गैलेरी' and gold decorative divider. Style the card with maroon borders, white background, rounded corners, and shadow effects consistent with the existing maroon/gold OKLCH palette defined in the global styles. Ensure images are responsive with proper aspect ratios and hover effects.
